Updates.Description: Recommended hotfixes and updates for Windows Server 2012-based Failover Clusters

Update.Description: 2014-02-12 Cluster group that has dependent resources does not fail over on a Windows Server 2012-based or Windows Server 2008 SP2-based computer
2014-02-12 Windows RT, Windows 8, and Windows Server 2012 update rollup: February 2014
2014-01-15 OffloadWrite is doing PrepareForCriticalIo for the whole VHD in a Windows Server 2012 or Windows Server 2012 R2 Hyper-V host
2014-01-14 Windows RT, Windows 8, and Windows Server 2012 update rollup: January 2014
2013-12-23 Update is available that improves the resiliency of the cloud service provider in Windows Server 2012: December 2013
Update.Notes: This update replace update KB2870270, include also updates KB2869923, KB2908415

Update.Description: 2013-12-12 "0x8007007A" error when you migrate a virtual machine that's running Windows Server 2012
2013-12-12 A hotfix is available that adds two new cluster control codes to help you determine which cluster node is blocking a GUM update in Windows Server 2008 R2 and Windows Server 2012
2013-12-10 Windows RT, Windows 8, and Windows Server 2012 update rollup: December 2013
2013-12-10 Clustered virtual machine cannot access LUNs over a Synthetic Fibre Channel after you perform live migration on Windows Server 2012 or Windows Server 2012 R2-based Hyper-V hosts
2013-11-14 Error message when you try to schedule a shadow copy task in Windows Server 2012
2013-06-14 Can't access a resource that is hosted on a Windows 8 or Windows Server 2012-based failover cluster
2013-01-23 Failover Cluster Management snap-in crashes after you install update 2750149 on a Windows Server 2012-based failover cluster
2012-11-13 Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012 cumulative update: November 2012
2012-11-13 Error code when the kpasswd protocol fails after you perform an authoritative restore: "KDC_ERROR_S_PRINCIPAL_UNKNOWN"
Update.Notes: This hotfix is related for W2K12 based clusters if W2K8 or W2K8 R2 domain controllers are available in the environment.
